meanings.definition: The act or process of creating a composition using photographs.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed making photocompositions for her art class.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed beautiful photocompositions of nature scenes.
meanings.sent3: The photocompositions she made were so funny, they made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her photocompositions were like puzzles, each piece fitting perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The photocompositions captured the essence of each moment in time.

meanings.sent1: He admired the photocompositions in the photography exhibit.
meanings.sent2: The book featured stunning photocompositions of city landscapes.
meanings.sent3: The photocompositions on the wall seemed to come alive at night.
meanings.sent4: Her photocompositions were windows into different worlds.
meanings.sent5: The photocompositions told stories without words, only images.
